node.doctext:
Ok, listen. You know how to write.

So now's the time to do it. Read [NaNoWriMo] if you must know, and get your writing cap on. Here's how you can check in on each other.

2002.11.13@20:14 ([nanowrimo]) [gnarl] says next year, i'm writing a smut novel. i shall title it 'poodleskirts'. 50,000 words, finished in one draft, no problem.
node.title: nanowrimo
